subsection_content:
Ankle synovitis directly affects mobility and daily activities. Not to mention, if the condition progresses seriously but is not treated promptly, inflammation can leave many other dangerous complications. Therefore, proactive prevention from the beginning is really necessary. Some useful measures that can be applied include:
Exercise regularly, including stretching exercises such as yoga, tai chi (at least 30 minutes a day), swimming... to reduce stress on the ankle joints.; Always warm up thoroughly before exercising; Build a diet with foods that have good anti-inflammatory properties (broccoli, bell peppers, avocados...), avoid processed foods or lots of sugar as much as possible; Maintain a healthy weight to help reduce stress that leads to joint pain.; After the inflammation has been healed, to avoid recurrence, the patient should switch to gentler sports, such as cycling, yoga... instead of jogging.; Absolutely avoid repetitive movements, jerking or sudden weight increases during exercise.; Treatment of diseases that can lead to ankle bursitis such as gout, rheumatoid arthritis...; Wear footwear that fits your feet to reduce rubbing and excessive stress in the Achilles area. Sufficient width will ensure minimal compression, minimizing friction between the first and fifth ankle joints, thereby reducing the risk of disease.
Center for Orthopedic Trauma, Tam Anh General Hospital System, is where a team of leading experts, experienced, dedicated, and enthusiastic surgeons gather such as: TTND.Prof.Dr.Nguyen Viet Tien; Associate Professor, Dr. Dang Hong Hoa; Dr. Tang Ha Nam Anh; MSc.BS.CKII Tran Anh Vu; BS.CKI Tran Xuan Anh, MSc.CKI Le Dinh Khoa, PhD.Do Tien Dung; Dr. BS.CKII Vu Huu Dung... This is also one of the pioneer units in diagnosing and treating musculoskeletal diseases with modern techniques according to updated international protocols.
The hospital is also equipped with modern machinery and diagnostic imaging equipment such as: Somatom Drive 768-slice CT scanner, new generation magnetic resonance machine Magnetom Amira BioMatrix, Artis Pheno robot, densitometer bones, ultrasound machines...; Opmi Vario 700 Zeiss surgical microscope system, Meera-Maquet operating table... to be able to detect injuries early and effectively treat musculoskeletal diseases...
Tam Anh General Hospital also owns a spacious clinic system and high-class boarding area; modern rehabilitation area; Comprehensive post-operative care process helps patients quickly recover and stabilize their health after surgery.

Above is a summary of information related to ankle joint synovitis. Hopefully with these useful updates, patients will have more new knowledge to proactively prevent, monitor, detect and treat promptly, minimizing unwanted complications.
